document.full_text: the former chief executive officer of bankrupt taylor, bean & whitaker mortgage corp pleaded guilty on friday to his role in a $1.5 billion fraud scheme that contributed to the company's collapse.
document.title: ex-tbw executive pleads guilty to mortgage fraud
lines_and_colors: the former chief executive officer of bankrupt taylor, bean & whitaker mortgage corp pleaded guilty on friday to his role in a $1.5 billion fraud scheme that contributed to the company's collapse.
